testproblem.name: Dense blob in a beaker falling under gravity. Combining linear momentum+mesh movement+mesh adaptivity to sanity check free surface behaviour.

problem_definition.command_line: fluidity -v3 -l beaker_blob_adapt.flmlmpiexec flredecomp -i 1 -o 4 beaker_blob beaker_blob_parallel; mpiexec fluidity -v3 -l beaker_blob_parallel.flml

variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files

import h5py import numpy as np det=h5py.File('beaker_blob.detectors.h5part', 'r') tm_id = det.attrs['TopMiddle%ids'][0]-1 fsl=np.asarray([det[f'/Step#{n}/Water%FreeSurface'][tm_id] for n in range(len(det))]) fs_centre={} fs_centre['min']=fsl.min()
